description: Main entry point of a Flutter mobile application defining the root widget and home page UI.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application that sets up theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage handling the widget's UI build.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method constructing the widget tree for MyApp and MyHomePage.
